name: 1980: The Quiz
description:
A sequel to the original 1980! https://ioquack.itch.io/1980-full

!!PLEASE PLAY THE FIRST GAME OR ELSE YOU WILL BE CONFUSED WITH WHAT IS HAPPENING!!

THIS GAME USES YOUR MICROPHONE!

After playing the scary, weird odd platformer game, the computer restarted itself, and gave you an option to start a quiz. You decided to start it, because you don't have anything better to do.

YOU, the player, answer the questions........
